name: Schema for limit

sources.title: OGC API Features - Part 1 - Core corrigendum

abstract: This building block corresponds to the schema for an OGC API Records featureId
annotatedSchema:
name: limit
in: query
description: 'The optional limit parameter limits the number of items that are presented
  in the response document.


  Only items are counted that are on the first level of the collection in the response
  document.

  Nested objects contained within the explicitly requested items shall not be counted.


  Minimum = 1. Maximum = 10000. Default = 10.'
required: false
schema:
  type: integer
  minimum: 1
  maximum: 10000
  default: 10
style: form
explode: false
